items.title: The 10 Best California Cabernet Sauvignons Under $50
items.excerpt: It’s no secret that some California Cabernets come with lofty price tags . Ever since Stag’s Leap Wine Cellars won the 1976 Judgement of Paris , the Napa Valley has been considered America’s premier wine region — and most of the wine from the region doesn’t come cheap.

items.title: Cans Changed Craft Beer Forever. What Comes Next?
items.excerpt: Will craft beer lovers still host “bottle shares” if bottles themselves cease to exist? That may sound like a modern-day Zen koan, but it’s not exactly beyond contemplation.
